pullRequest.title: Convert DateFieldMapperTests to MapperTestCase
pullRequest.bodyText:
I want to add some new tests around null_value handling here, and MapperTestCase
just makes this all so much nicer.

nodes.bodyText: I've been running the auto-formatter over chunks like this while I go because one day that auto-formatter will run on our whole code base and I figure if I grab stuff like this now it'll make the diff smaller. And I can look at the results and make sure it does a good job.
